name: Eddy紫 ~Eddy Violet~
description: "Eddy Violet" is an Dreampunk and Postcyberpunk-based ACT game developed in the span of two years. I finished all the sections of game design by myself including 30 pieces of original...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Inter(R)Celeron(R) Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: SIS Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Realtek AC’97 Audio
